title: The Yorick rework soon approaches...
body:
https://2.bp.blogspot.com/-nEITVOx5da4/V64hEl4q7KI/AAAAAAAA9mo/AXvZ59Iki9Y9rHX3mCbJYy-R1dthI_-mQCLcB/s1600/Yorick_E_Cone.png

> While we know Yorick's large scope champion update is coming up in the near future, a lone "**Yorick_E_Cone**" file was added in today's PBE update - notably a different type of cast indicator vs his current pre-update E!

Me thinks it might pop up next patch considering assets are popping up on PBE already.

On a scale of 1 to 10, how bad/annoying do you think this rework will be based upon previous reworks that happened?

######sauce for anyone who can't find it and was about to ask: http://www.surrenderat20.net/2016/08/812-pbe-update.html
